description: Numbers n such that n divides the sum of the first n partition numbers (A000041) and the sum of the first n unique partition numbers (A000009).
mathematica: s = 0; Do[ s = s + PartitionsP[n] + PartitionsQ[n] If[ Mod[ s, n] == 0, Print[n] ], {n, 1, 53100} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 18 2001
